entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
